backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining academic tracking types (SubjectScores, Score9Scale, AcademicEntry, BoardExamResults), coding challenge types, user profiles, access control integration, and public/query functions for managing academic entries, board exams, coding attempts, user roles, and data export/import with stable variable persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: updated grading thresholds (90-100=A+, 80-89=A, etc.), PE as an elective for all subgroups, and Mathematics restricted to Commerce subgroup only, with high confidence and mapped test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components including App.tsx (main auth/navigation), hooks (useQueries for backend operations), AcademicModule (four-tab interface), AddMarksForm (marks entry with 9-scale preview and subject restrictions), ProgressView (visualization), CodingModule, DataManagement, UserManagement, and utility functions for grading and percentage calculations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with proper DOCTYPE, meta tags for SEO and viewport configuration, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with Internet Identity authentication, profile setup flow, admin detection, module navigation (academic/coding/data/users), ThemeProvider integration, and loading/unauthenticated states.
frontend/src/components/AcademicModule.t: Academic module container with four-tab interface (Add Marks, View Progress, Subject Analysis, 9-Scale Grades) that automatically switches to Progress View after successful mark submission.
frontend/src/components/AddMarksForm.tsx: Form component for adding academic entries with grade/term/stream/subgroup selection, dynamic subject configuration based on grade and subgroup (PE as elective for all, Math restricted to Commerce subgroups CEBA/CEBA-CS), raw marks input with max marks configuration, real-time 9-scale grade preview, and letter grade calculation using updated thresholds.
frontend/src/components/CodingEditor.tsx: React component providing a Python code editor with challenge selection, code execution using Pyodide, output display, and ability to save coding attempts with scores.
frontend/src/components/CodingHistory.ts: Displays a collapsible accordion list of all saved coding attempts with challenge titles, timestamps, scores, code snippets, and execution results.
frontend/src/components/CodingModule.tsx: Tab-based container component that switches between the CodingEditor and CodingHistory views for Python coding practice.
frontend/src/components/DataManagement.t: Provides data export (JSON/CSV) and import functionality for academic entries, coding attempts, and full system data with admin controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with an animated heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with module switcher (Academic/Coding/Users/Data), theme toggle, and Internet Identity authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/NineScaleGradesV: Displays academic subject grades converted to a 9-scale system with filtering by grade level, section, and term, showing grade cards with color-coded badges.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A form component for new users to set up their profile by entering their name, using the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation hook and displaying toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Displays academic progress with filtering (grade, section, term), sorting, and visualizations including tables, bar charts, line charts, board exam results, and grade aggregates using Recharts and custom grade calculation utilities.
frontend/src/components/SubjectAnalysisV: Analyzes subject-wise academic performance with filters for grade, section, and term, displaying statistics (average, highest, lowest marks) in tables and bar charts, handling max marks validation and fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Admin component for assigning user roles (user or admin) by entering a Principal ID, using the useAssignUserRole mutation hook with form validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using @dfinity/auth-client with configurable options for delegation and idle behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/usePyodide.ts: Hook that loads and manages a singleton Pyodide instance for running Python code in the browser, capturing stdout/stderr and handling initialization errors with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, academic entries, board exam results, coding challenges, and admin operations using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/boardExam.ts: Provides Grade 10 board exam calculation logic where AI marks can substitute for the lowest of Math/Science/Social if it improves the total, returning a maximum of 500 marks.
frontend/src/lib/gradeCalculation.ts: Contains utilities for calculating letter grades (A+ to F), 9-scale grades (0-9), and percentages from raw marks, plus color mapping for grade badges.
frontend/src/lib/maxMarks.ts: Defines grade-wise and subject-specific maximum marks rules (e.g., Grades 1-2: 30 marks regular, 20 Computer; Grade 10 board: 100 per subject) with configuration and calculation functions.
frontend/src/lib/percent.ts: Utility functions for clamping percentages to 0-100 range, formatting percentage values, and calculating percentages from marks.
frontend/src/lib/subjectAnalysis.ts: Computes subject-wise statistics (average, highest, lowest, count) from academic entries using grade-appropriate max marks and percentage calculations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH variables, container settings, border radius, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a student grading system with three completed features: customizable grade boundaries (A+ to F), PE as an elective for all subgroups, and Mathematics restricted to commerce subgroup only. Currently marked as a fix request with no known issues or new feature requests pending.
